timeline.bodyText: This looks like a typo to me. Shouldn't that be org.dspace.statistics.AnonymizeStatistics? ( pnb )
timeline.author: ssolim
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -380,4 +380,11 @@
             <class>org.dspace.app.util.Version</class>
         </step>
     </command>
+    <command>
+        <name>anonymize-statistics</name>
+        <description>Anonymize the ip values of the solr statistics</description>
+        <step>
+            <class>com.atmire.dspace.statistics.AnonymizeStatistics</class>

timeline.message: DS-4440 GDPR - Anonymize statistics feature - feedback
DS-4440 GDPR - Anonymize statistics feature - feedback: default configuration & spelling
DS-4440 GDPR - Anonymize statistics feature - feedback: default configuration & spelling bis
DS-4440 GDPR - Anonymize statistics feature - feedback: default configuration & spelling tris

timeline.bodyText: There are two superfluous quotes at the end of the two mask options.
timeline.author: AlexanderS
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -40,4 +40,21 @@ usage-statistics.authorization.admin.workflow=true
 
 # Enable/disable if a matching for a bot should be case sensitive
 # Setting this value to true will increase cpu usage, but bots will be found more accurately
-#usage-statistics.bots.case-insensitive = false
\ No newline at end of file
+#usage-statistics.bots.case-insensitive = false
+
+# Configuration parameters for anonymizing statistics
+
+# Anonymize statistics the moment they are created
+# anonymize_statistics.anonymize_on_log = false
+
+# Mask to replace the last group of an IPv4 address
+# anonymize_statistics.ip_v4_mask = 255"
+
+# Mask to replace the last two groups of an IPv6 address
+# anonymize_statistics.ip_v6_mask = FFFF:FFFF"

timeline.bodyText: The space before the config settings with the default values should be removed, so that there is a difference between comments and default config values.
timeline.author: AlexanderS
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -40,4 +40,21 @@ usage-statistics.authorization.admin.workflow=true
 
 # Enable/disable if a matching for a bot should be case sensitive
 # Setting this value to true will increase cpu usage, but bots will be found more accurately
-#usage-statistics.bots.case-insensitive = false
\ No newline at end of file
+#usage-statistics.bots.case-insensitive = false
+
+# Configuration parameters for anonymizing statistics
+
+# Anonymize statistics the moment they are created
+# anonymize_statistics.anonymize_on_log = false

timeline.message: DS-4440 GDPR - Anonymize statistics feature - feedback: default configuration
